sql.sql:
select 
    c.CODE "code", 
    c.LONGNAME "name", 
    c.styp "baseType", 
    p.code "parentCode" 
from l_ensdsc c, l_ensdsc_std p 
where c.arcfl='0' 
    and c.id_hi=p.id(+) 
    and c.code=nvl(:code, c.code) 
    and (:code is null and :parentCode is null and c.id_hi is null 
        or :code is null and :parentCode is not null and :parentCode=p.code 
        or :code is not null and :parentCode is null)
order by c.code

select 
    c.CODE "code", 
    c.LONGNAME "name", 
    p.code "parentCode",
    c.styp "baseType",
    c.groupfl
from l_ensdsc c, l_ensdsc_std p 
where c.arcfl='0' 
    and c.id_hi=p.id(+) 
    and c.code=nvl(:code, c.code) 
    and (:code is null and :baseType is null and :parentCode is null and c.id_hi is null 
        or :code is null and :parentCode is not null and :parentCode=p.code or :code is not null and :parentCode is null
        or :baseType is not null and c.styp=:baseType and c.groupfl='0'
        )
order by c.code
